name: 青少年文化與教育
description: 本門課程旨在透過對青少年文化的探討，指出青少年文化研究的重心及相關問題，並試著提出青少年文化研究在教育上之意涵。到底青少年是怎樣的同儕團體？對他們的文化應如何正確的瞭解？這些青少年的文化是如何形成的？青少年文化對於教育現場的老師來說具有何種意義？這些都是探討青少年文化與教育必須關心的重要課題。
goals: 認識青少年文化的基本概念與理論
掌握青少年文化的主要課題及發展趨勢
探討青少年文化與教育的關係
syllabus:
**Youth Culture and Education\_ Syllabus (EMI Class\_Taught in English)**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Week 1 (2/14): Introduction (Requirements and Assignments) (Warm-up class discussion-"Skipping class" is a must-do in College?)

Week 2 (2/21): Theoretical Foundation I: The Meanings, Characteristics, and Types of Youth Culture.”

Week 3 (2/28): National Holiday (228 Peace Memorial day)

Week 4 (3/7): Theoretical Foundation II: The Changing of Youth Culture in Taiwan: From "Strawberry Generation" to "Youth Precariat"

Week 5 (3/14): Educational Phenomena I: Youth Culture in College (Who's taking advantage in developing a love relationship?)

Week 6 (3/21): Educational Phenomena II: Youth Culture in Senior High School (Why reading English in a Math class?)

Week 7 (3/28): Educational Phenomena III: Youth Culture in Junior High School and Primary School (Passive in class and active during recess?)

Week 8 (4/4): National Holiday (Qingming Festival)

Week 9 (4/11): Midterm Exam & Temporary Topic for Group Presentation

Week 10 (4/18): Important Issues of Youth Culture I: Young Generation's Popular Cultures (Memes & Social Media)

Week 11 (4/25): Important Issues of Youth Culture II: Young Generation's Points of View on Romantic Relationship (From dating to breakup)

Week 12 (5/2): Movie Time (Related to Youth Culture)   

Week 13 (5/9): Group Presentation I

Week 14 (5/16): Group Presentation II

Week 15 (5/23): Group Presentation III

Week 16 (5/30): Final Exam

Week 17 (6/6): Self-Directed Learning I

Week 18 (6/13): Self-Directed Learning II

grading.note: Group Presentation (3-5 members) (Topic of Group's Interest)
